    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BinarySearchTree()

        Parameters:

      • treePredecessor

        public Node treePredecessor(Node node)
        find the predecessor of given node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node that we search the predecessor of
        Returns:
        a pointer to the predecessor of the given node. returns null if the given node is the minimum

      • treeSuccessor

        public Node treeSuccessor(Node node)
        find the successor of given node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node that we search the successor of
        Returns:
        a pointer to the successor of the given node. returns null if the given node is the maximum
